title: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Baroque Vase", 1940
medium: Brush and blue, gray and pink gouache (possibly pochoir); graphite on newsprint
signed: Lower right in blue gouache: A.H.Girard., Aug. / 28'40
provenance: From the office of Alexander H. Girard
description: Three blue, white and gray vases holding sprays of three large pink flowers  two smaller ones below, surrounded by four leaves. At bottom of sheet, the three flower groups are shown without the vases.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Baroque Vase", 1940.Brush and blue, gray and pink gouache (possibly pochoir); graphite on newsprint. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-179.
